sentences.en: After our technicians have the damage appraised, we will apprise you the results.
sentences.cn: 在我们的技术人员鉴定损失后, 我们会通知你结果.

sentences.en: Have customers been fully apprised of the advantages?
sentences.cn: 客户有没有被充分告知各项好处呢？

sentences.en: He conceived that it would be fine to let that event apprise Ruth of his return.
sentences.cn: 他设想最好以文章见报的方式告诉露丝他已回来了.

sentences.en: I need to speak to my professor and apprise him of the change.
sentences.cn: 我得跟我的教授谈谈,通知他这个变更事项.

sentences.en: I shall not fail to apprise you of my arrival.
She came in to apprise me that my presence was required.
sentences.cn: 她进来通知我(有事)需要我出面.

sentences.en: She came in to apprise, apprize me that my presence was required.
sentences.cn: 她进来通知我需要我出面.

sentences.en: We must apprise them of the dangers that may be involved.
sentences.cn: 我们必须告诉他们可能涉及的危险。

trans.tran_en: to tell or give someone information about something
